com.stretchsense.demosingle.ble

Class StretchSenseLibraryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stretchsense.demosingle.ble.StretchSenseLibraryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StretchSenseLibraryQueueExecutor.StretchSenseLibraryQueueExecutorListener

    public class StretchSenseLibraryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements StretchSenseLibraryQueueExecutor.StretchSenseLibraryQueueExecutorListener
    StretchSenseLibraryManager Class Bluetooth manager to discover, connect and communicate with a StretchSense sensor
    Since:
    07/2016
    See Also:
    www.stretchsense.com

      static interface  StretchSenseLibraryManager.StretchSenseLibraryManagerListener
      Defined what to do for every step of connection and communication with the device

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean AUTOCONNECT
      Boolean to connect automatically when a sensor is detected or wait for the connect function

      List of all the StretchSense sensor available

      java.util.ArrayList<StretchSensePeripheralConnected> listStretchSensePeripheralsOnceConnected
      List of all the StretchSense sensor once connected
      long SCAN_PERIOD
      Time period to scan for a sensor
      int TYPE_OF_AVERAGE
      Type of average used (NO_AVERAGE, AVERAGE_IIR or AVERAGE_FIR)
      int VALUE_SAMPLING_TIME
      Initial value of sampling time between two sample ((value + 1)*40ms)
